description: Information about when letters get released to MyChart.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user which released this letter to MyChart

columns.name: LETTER_REL_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action taken regarding releasing this letter to MyChart


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Release


Unrelease

columns.name: LETTER_RELEASE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which this action related to releasing this letter to MyChart was taken.
